long_description: Say so long to disposable plastic utensils! When you're on the go, enjoy every meal with the reusable To-Go Ware Bamboo Utensil set. To-Go Ware set gives you a fork, spoon, knife and chopsticks, all made from lightweight and strong bamboo wood. Utensils are hand-finished with natural, food-safe wood oil; bamboo wood does not stain or absorb flavors. Included RePEaT holder is made out of recycled PET plastic, giving new life to used plastic bottles. Compact holder slips easily into small spaces; includes a small carabiner so you can clip the holder to a backpack.
short_description: Say so long to disposable plastic utensils! When you're on the go, enjoy every meal with the reusable To-Go Ware Bamboo Utensil set.
